Series H: Cornelia Conway Felton Horsford (Nellie)
Stone, Mrs. George F: London, England; Hartford, CT
Stone, Mrs. George F: London, England; Hartford, CT

3 Photographs, 2 Letters, 2 Envelopes with Ephemera, Postage and Seal
Addressed To: "Miss [Cornelia Conway Felton] Horsford, 27 Craigie Street, Cambridge, MA / Sylvester Manor, Shelter Island Heights, NY"
Sent From: "Mrs. George F. Stone, 44 Pont Street, [London, England], SW1, Telephone Kensington 4326," "991 Asylum Avenue, Hartford, CT"
In Reference To: Friendship / Personal / Social / Travel; 1 Clipping "Second Lieutenant Allen Francis Synge" Obituary; 3 B and W Wallet-Sized Photographs of Exteriors - Horsford Home in Moscow, NY, Church in Moscow, NY, Northern Spy Orchard in East Bloomfield, NY
16 Pages, Bound and Unbound
Typed, Printed and Handwritten in Ink
Measurements: 4.5" x 3.5" - 6" x 7"
Stone, Mrs. George F: London, England; Hartford, CT: 1918 February 8; 1931 December 18; undated, circa 1918 - 1931
